title: Drawing, "Shepherd Boy and Shepherdess in a Landscape", 1767
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and black wash over graphite on off-white laid paper
signed: In ink lower right: Le Prince 1767
description: A shepherd boy playesa flute, at left, while a shepherdess wearing a turban listens. Their sheep are shown in a rocky, and wooded landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shepherd Boy and Shepherdess in a Landscape", 1767.
1767. Pen and black ink, brush and black wash over graphite on off-white laid paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-204.
